TopicTitle: How to remove decoupler from staging list?

Articles.Content: Exactly what title says, is there any way to remove some part (namel decoupler) from staging entirely (I recall this was possible in earlier versions)?
You can disable staging on the decoupler.  However, I believe you need to have Advanced Tweakables enabled to do this.  You can turn that on in the game settings.
My tricks is to use an docking port. This leaves you with an docking port after staging.
